transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Sir, good afternoon. I am Vidushi speaking from IndiaMART. Sir, you had called. Did you have any query?
Customer: Madam, that is done. Your IndiaMART team, Shailjal ji, had called.
Executive: Sir, that is, that is our customer care team. If you contact on that number, then a ticket will open for us. So, that is why the ticket is open. If there is any query or any doubt, then I am handling your profile from now. That means I will be your account manager. So, if you have to call sometime, then you will have to call on this number.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay. This is the number I will call on.
Customer: Yes, you will have to call on this number. And sir, your welcome call is also pending. If you are available now, then we will do the welcome call.
Executive: Madam, I am a little out of city today. We can do it tomorrow morning.
Executive: Uh, tomorrow morning.
Customer: Madam, what is your name?
Executive: Vidushi Tyagi.
Customer: Vidushi.
Executive: Yes, Vidushi Tyagi. So sir, one thing, your account manager is you, right?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Yes. Yes, your account manager is me from now. Earlier your data was in another department, now it has come to me. Your service is running, right, MDC's? It will expire in November. Yes, it is running now.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Yes. Sir, let's do one thing. You tell me one or two things so that I can understand your profile a little bit. Because now our business is dealing in the whole pan India.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Pan India. Okay. And majorly there are some such cities, like I am and I deal in the most business in 10 cities, like Delhi, Hyderabad, Chennai. So how many are your preferred cities?
Customer: Preferred cities, whatever mega cities are there, those are our preferred cities.
Executive: Okay, so there is nothing like city wise you have listing done, so you will be comfortable consuming the whole pan India buyleads.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Okay. And second, our products, like one product is our 500 gram 4D Shine Roots Pro, uh, Potassium Humate Chinese Flakes.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: So this is in powder form. Mostly this product is a medicine or for what usage it is given?
Customer: Madam, these are three categories in our company, three categories.
Executive: Yes.
Customer: One is food supplements category, in which we make herbal tablets, capsules, powder.
Executive: Yes.
Customer: For human beings, one is there and one is fertilizer category, organic fertilizer.
Executive: Yes, so what happens in that?
Customer: Fertilizer is given in agriculture as a fertilizer.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Growth enhancing products are there with us.
Executive: Okay, okay, okay. Okay.
Customer: And one is our feed food, one animal feed supplement product, animal product.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Basically, for cows, buffaloes, it is for them.
Customer: Yes, yes, cows, buffaloes, it is for them. Three categories of manufacturing are there with us.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: So we have to promote all three. We do third party manufacturing mostly in all these products, third party manufacturing.
Executive: Okay, okay. Okay.
Customer: Some products are available in the market from our brand also and rest we do third party. So now I have to increase my manufacturing in any case.
Executive: Yes. And sir, like you must have talked to someone from whom you have taken the service of IndiaMART.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Has anyone made any miscommitment to you regarding the services?
Customer: No, there was no miscommitment. There was only one commitment that 15 buyleads will increase for me on January 1st.
Executive: 15 buyleads will increase on January 1st?
Customer: Yes, it was said that extra will be given, there was such a commitment.
Executive: Because you have taken extra, right, BL?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Okay, so see sir, you have taken MDC service, which will run for one year. In this service, you will get one buylead daily and you will get 10 buyleads in one week. So total 17 buyleads you will get, 17 buyleads.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Yes. So 17 buyleads you are getting, so accordingly sir, you have to consume at least 15 to 16 buyleads in one week, you have to be active. Now you do one thing, now you do one thing, will this number be available on WhatsApp sir?
Customer: Yes, it is available madam.
Executive: So I will share two to three buyleads with you on WhatsApp, you consume them also and you will have inquiry on your portal. So you have to reply to those inquiries also. In the starting when our service runs, so it is a starting form, then our profile will start running in a flow. Daily basis if there is any requirement, I am ready to help for that. I will guide you each and everything. Tomorrow morning what time we will schedule the video meeting?
Customer: Uh, do it at 11:00 am madam.
Executive: Tomorrow 11:00 am. So sir, this is done. I will schedule because it is done. Tomorrow 11:00 am, we will complete it. Welcome call from our side, we will complete it.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay madam. In that you go through your doubts, whatever will be there, once at night you go through the website, in that you have any doubts or any query regarding the portal, you can ask me tomorrow in detail, I will tell you in that.
Customer: Sure madam, sure.
Executive: And but from your end if there is no information, I will close this ticket. Sir, if there is no query, you had called on customer care.
Customer: Yes, close it madam.
Executive: Okay. Sir, I want to know your name.
Customer: Balram Patel is my name.
Executive: Balram Patel. Okay, GST is also in your name.
Customer: Yes, yes. My brother's name.
Executive: Yes, yes, I understood. Okay sir, I will close it and I will call you tomorrow then. Okay.
Customer: Sure madam.
Executive: Okay sir, thank you very much sir. Thank you.
Customer: You are welcome madam. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquired about the increase in buyleads.

- Enquired about the MDC service.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified the buyleads details.

- Executive explained the MDC service benefits.

- Executive offered to share buyleads on WhatsApp.

- Video meeting scheduled for the next day.



Next Steps: 

- Video meeting scheduled for the next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, mdc, welcome call, whatsapp
